product_name: Dale of Norway Merino Baselayer Zip-Neck Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A great next-to-skin layer, the Dale of Norway Merino Baselayer zip-neck women's top features soft merino wool to keep you cozy during long days on the slopes. Lightweight merino wool insulates while remaining naturally breathable and odor-resistant; wool continues to insulate even when wet. Quater-zip opening; off-shoulder seams reduce chafing and irritation. Athletic fit hugs the body. Machine washable. Closeout.
short_description: A great next-to-skin layer, the Dale of Norway Merino Baselayer zip-neck women's top features soft merino wool to keep you cozy during long days on the slopes.
